data.text:
@ReopenCASchools The Science in three acts.
1: AAP calls for schools to reopen. 
2: Trump calls for schools to reopen.
3: AAP calls for schools to stay closed
@ReopenCASchools @RJUHSD Call up the CDC and get this into an MMWR! 🤣
@ReopenCASchools @RJUHSD What I love about presenting it like this is that anyone who supports masks is going to say "that decrease isn't from masking/not masking" to which we can say EXACTLY!!!!!
@ReopenCASchools @RJUHSD No school in our town should be forcing kids to wear masks ANY longer! The scared can homeschool, kids must be free to be kids. Not instruments for politicians to abuse.
We must never forget the failed policies of the past two years. Our kids should always come first, as RJUHSD did here with this fateful vote. Thank you @RJUHSD! 👏 https://t.co/FfzKGY103r

The same people who advocated for indefinite school closures are the same ones advocating for indefinite masking. They were wrong about schools and are wrong about masks. Stop letting them set policy. Itâ€™s harming kids. 

FYI - here is the RJUHSD dashboard data used in the graph. https://t.co/DOFajq1Oga
